# The `NoAutoPaddingScope` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A RAII helper which defines a region of instructions which can&#39;t have padding added between them for correctness. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A RAII helper which defines a region of instructions which can&#39;t have padding added between them for correctness.
